pageContext.claim: “We rarely won a lawsuit [in the World Trade Organization] except for the last year. You know, in the last year, we’re starting to win a lot. You know why? Because they know if we don’t, I’m out of there. I’ll take them out. We’re starting to win lawsuits that we never -- you know that. We never won lawsuits because the courts are stacked. You know they -- it’s sad. We have a minority on the courts.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is wrong. The United States has won about 90 percent of cases it brings, but it loses most of the cases brought against it. That's the case for most other countries as well. Most cases are also settled before they appears before the WTO dispute panel.
